intro: Consolida, commonly known as sweet rocket, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Papaveraceae. It is characterized by its showy, often brightly colored flowers that resemble those of the poppy family. The plants typically have alternate, lance-shaped leaves and are often found in disturbed soils or along roadsides. Consolida species are annual or biennial herbs that produce elongated seed pods containing numerous small, fluffy seeds. They are popular in gardens for their ornamental value and ease of cultivation.
